welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eppstein, a charming city known for its historical castles and breathtaking landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the beauty our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily used for Lufthansa flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 24-hour limit per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
